articles.author: Jon Gambrell
articles.title: Undersea cables cut in the Red Sea, disrupting internet access in Asia and the Mideast - AP News
articles.description: Undersea cable cuts in the Red Sea have disrupted internet access in parts of Asia and the Middle East. Experts say the disruption began early Sunday, but the cause remains unclear. There are concerns about possible targeting by Yemen's Houthi rebels, though …
articles.content: DUBAI, United Arab Emirates (AP) Undersea cable cuts in the Red Sea disrupted internet access in parts of Asia and the Middle East, experts said Sunday, though it wasnt immediately clear what caused … [+3653 chars]
